I’ve been in Delhi all my life, plenty summers to know that this year stepping out for just a 15 mins is a task. 41 degrees at 10 pm, the nauseating heat all day. Those of us confined in our AC homes find it unbearable. Think of the city’s poor forced to live & work outdoors.
The way people described Delhi to me today was it's hot but cold and also dry but humid. Dude Delhi is a bipolar city.
Delhi's weather is trying its best to get its people sick. Hailstorm, Bright sunny day, Cold foggy morning at 13 degrees. All in 24 hrs.
